mapper.select: SELECT tdatetime, bcf1_cf_pv, bcf1_oil_pv, (bcf1_cp_pv * 0.001) AS bcf1_cp_pv, bcf2_cf_pv, (bcf2_cp_pv * 0.001) AS bcf2_cp_pv, bcf3_cf_pv, bcf3_oil_pv, (bcf3_cp_pv * 0.001) AS bcf3_cp_pv, bcf4_cf_pv, bcf4_oil_pv, (bcf4_cp_pv * 0.001) AS bcf4_cp_pv, bcf5_cf_pv, bcf5_oil_pv, bcf5_cp_pv, tf1_zone1, tf1_zone2, tf1_zone3 FROM tb_temp WHERE tdatetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY tdatetime
